description: Try our easy to follow Easy Biscuits with Cheesecake Filling recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Biscuit,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Baking,Peanut free
name: Easy Biscuits with Cheesecake Filling Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup icing sugar mixture (for cheesecake filling)
125g cream cheese, chopped at room temperature (for cheesecake filling)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C fanforced. Combine flour, ginger, coconut, oats and brown sugar in a large bowl. Make a well in centre.

Place butter, golden syrup, honey and 2 tablespoons of cold water in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 23 minutes or until butter has melted and mixture comes to simmer. Remove from heat. Stir in bicarbonate of soda. Pour into dry ingredients. Mix well.

Roll a heaped teaspoonful of mixture into a ball. Place onto baking paperlined oven trays and flatten slightly. Repeat with remaining mixture to make 44 biscuits, allowing room for spreading. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until golden. Cool on trays for 10 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool.
For the cheesecake filling; beat all the ingredients in an electric mixer until well combined.

Spread a spoonful of filling onto the flatside of half the biscuits. Sandwich together with remaining biscuits. Serve immediately. Tip 1: Sandwich biscuits together with filling just before serving. Tip 2: You can replace the cheesecake filling with Hokey Pokey ice cream. Tip 3: For choc chip biscuits add 1/2 cup choc chips to the mixture in step 1 with the oats.
